dict.string: The Imitation Game
Alan Turing saved millions of lives yet was terribly persecuted because he was gay.
P.S. I Love You
Darn you Gerard Butler for not only being ridiculously good looking but so good in this character.
Kingsman: The Secret Service
A veteran secret agent takes a young upstart under his wing.
Good Will Hunting
Will Hunting has a gift for mathematics but needs help from a psychologist to find direction in his life.
Atonement
I only liked the first half, when the little girl wasn't grown up yet.
Lucy
The first half of this movie was promising but then it dissolved into an over the top, corny mess.
Big Hero 6
Way to go Disney! This is a great movie and I think that everyone should get the opportunity to see it!
Monsters, Inc.
In order to power the city, monsters have to scare children so that they scream.
The Age of Adaline
Lively plays Adaline, a woman who has a car accident at the age of 29 in the 1930s.
V for Vendetta
although inspiring, I find the whole. British fighting for "freedom" ironic.
Furious 7
Deckard Shaw seeks revenge against Dominic Toretto and his family for his comatose brother.
Little Miss Sunshine
I love dark and dry comedies (such as Wes Anderson, obviously).
Frozen
Rapunzel has short, brown hair and is wearing a purple and pink dress, and Eugene is wearing a maroon vest and a brownish sash.
